A natural

Ociban is a high-end disinfectant coating that uses nano-technology to protect any surface from virusses,bacteria and other known pathogens.



Occiban is a high-end disinfectant coating that uses nano-technology to continuously protect any surface from virusses, bacteria and other known pathogens.

About Occiban

  • Liquid that can be spayed on hands and surfaces
  • Trusted product used in hospitals for over 15 years
  • 100% organic coating that lasts for over 30 days
  • Actively kills viruses, bacteria and other pathogens
  • Contains 0% alcohol does not dry out skin
  • Odourless and colourless, bonds to any surface
Contact

Occiban’s Nano Technology

Occiban’s main ingredient is water. Once the water dries up, the coating uses the properties of nano-molecular silicon dioxide to form a 4nm barrier.


This barrier will actively kill and protect against most known germs including the covid19 virus.


The coating only wears off due to heavy abrasion.

Why Occiban

Sustainable product

Made from mostly water, no alcohol or chemicals added.

Covid19 proof environment

Covid 19 proof

Proven to be 99,99% effective to kill Covid19 within 1 minute on any surface

Long lasting protection

Lasting protection

Handsanitizer protects hands 5000x longer than regular disinfectants without drying them out.
